purchasing.description: This is your authorization to provide Induction of Hepatic Microsomal Enzymes tests on materials provided by Lorillard. It is understood the above test includes as part of the price the 5-Day Rangefinder in the Rat test. The fixed price for the test, which is performed on groups of three materials is $10,000 per group. This authorization and price is applicable to tests initiated by Borriston between Jan. 1, 1982 through Dec. 31, 1982. Above tests are to be conducted in accordance with the Oct. 17, 1980 formal agreement between Borriston and Lorillard. All work is to be coordinated with our Dr. Harry Minnemeyer 919.373-6603
